channel.title: Slowed Down
channel.description:
my server is a great source, I had it working fast the first week. Now it slows down my computer to the extent where my computer will not load anything at all. I do not know how to fix this! Does anyone know how to fix this?
Sometime I get this in my console:[b] [KERNAL]This computer is too slow to run this server.[/b], but I use to run a 30player server.
Here is my computer stats:
CPU - AMD 3000+ 1.81Ghz RAM - Kingstion DDR 4 x 256mb = 1Gb DSL Connection HDD - 300Gb Maxtor
Any Ideas?

item.title: Slowed Down
item.dc:creator: @Lamez Lamez
item.description:
@Lamez wrote:

Alright, how to you recommend on doing this?

Read full topic

item.title: Slowed Down
item.dc:creator: @Lamez Lamez
item.description:
@Lamez wrote:

No, I have not added anything to my source.
The only thing I added was an item spawn
